about_the_game:
Nerdtastic Norman is on the adventure for his life! Struck by a car while on his way to buy flowers for his girlfriend, Norman ends up in purgatory, where he must face challenges on all 7 terraces to regain fragments of his shattered soul, defeat the keepers of the gate, and return back to the land of the living.

Nerdtastic Norman is a 2d Adventure, Puzzle platformer, where players try to solve puzzles and fend off enemies to find soul fragments. Over 70 Unique levels and dangerous boss battles in this side scrolling 2d adventure!

Norman's life is in your hands!

content_descriptors.notes: Mild fantasy violence. Adult themes regarding death and purgatory, based on the Book Inferno by Dante. Cartoon style violence.

detailed_description:

Struck by a car while on his way to buy flowers for his girlfriend, Norman ends up in purgatory, where he must face challenges on all 7 terraces to regain fragments of his shattered soul, defeat the keepers of the gate, and return back to the land of the living.

Nerdtastic Norman is a 2d Adventure, Puzzle platformer, where players try to solve puzzles and fend off enemies to find soul fragments. Over 70 Unique levels and dangerous boss battles in this side scrolling 2d adventure!

name: Nerdtastic Norman & The Soul Fragments Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: XP with SP2 or later, Windows 7 with SP1 or later, Windows 8.
  • Processor: 1 GHz.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 9 level capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Nerdtastic Norman is a 2d scrolling puzzle platformer set in purgatory based on Dante's Inferno. Over 70 unique levels, dangerously hard boss battles, and 1 unique story. Help Norman gather the missing pieces of his shattered soul, and help him return to the land of the living.
